titles.title: Begin My Tongue Some Heavenly Theme

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Begin my tongue some heav'nly theme newline And speak some boundless thing; newline The mighty works or mightier name, newline Of our eternal King.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Tell of His wondrous faithfulness newline And sound His pow'r abroad; newline Sing the sweet promise of His grace, newline The love and truth of God.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: His very word of grace is strong, newline As that which built the skies; newline The voice that roles the stars along, newline Speaks all the promises.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: O might I hear Thy heav'nly tongue, newline But whisper Thou art mine; newline Those gentle words shall raise my song, newline To notes almost divine.
